thread.title: Ivanka Trump, Secretary of Education Betsy DeVos celebrate Women's History Month by encouraging girls in STEM
thread.title_full: Ivanka Trump, Secretary of Education Betsy DeVos celebrate Women's History Month by encouraging girls in STEM

author: Anzish Mirza
title: Ivanka Trump, Secretary of Education Betsy DeVos celebrate Women's History Month by encouraging girls in STEM
text:
Ivanka Trump and Secretary of Education Betsy DeVos spoke at the Smithsonian National Air and Space Museum Tuesday on the importance of women in science, technology, engineering and math fields.
Read more...
